name: 7th World Conference on Social Sciences
content: Have you signed up to join the 7th World Conference on Social Sciences on the 05-07 of July 2024 in Zurich, Switzerland? If you havenâ€™t yet, then you should. As a member of academia, scholar, scientist, or researcher, staying on top of the trends is essential for your continued career development. social science conferences 2024 is an opportunity to learn from the international community of academics and address the latest developments in the field in an engaging, dynamic environment. International Conference On Social Sciences offers publishing opportunities with premier indexed journals, countless learning and networking sessions, and a warm, welcoming environment for all attendees. We are looking forward to your paper submission, poster presentation at the conference on social sciences and humanities, or attendee registration. See you in Zurich! The Organizing Committee will offer the participants a city tour of Zurich free of charge. All papers will have publication opportunities in the Conference Proceeding (with ISBN and a unique DOI number assigned to each paper) or in indexed international journals indexed with SCOPUS, DOAJ, EBSCO, GOOGLE SCHOLAR, COPERNICUS. The WORLDCSS will be an in-person event and will also include live-stream Virtual sessions for those who cannot join physically but wish to learn, and connect. In-Person participants and speakers will get a Letter of Invitation after registration.
